xyz.fsgik.common.io

Interface FsFile


  • @ThreadSafe
public interface FsFile
    Interface to operate file, thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream bindInputStream()
      Returns an input stream for current file, the read position is position().
      java.io.OutputStream bindOutputStream()
      Returns an output stream for current file, the written position is position().
      void close()
      Closes current file.
      static FsFile from(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Creates a FsFile from given path.
      java.nio.channels.FileChannel getChannel()
      Returns channel of file.
      java.io.FileDescriptor getDescriptor()
      Returns descriptor of file.
      default java.io.File getFile()
      Returns file object.
      java.nio.file.Path getPath()
      Returns path of file.
      boolean isOpened()
      Returns whether current file is opened.
      long length()
      Returns file length.
      void open(java.lang.String mode)
      Opens current file with given mode, the mode including "r", "rw", "rws", or "rwd", is same with RandomAccessFile.
      long position()
      Returns position of current file pointer.
      void position(long pos)
      Sets position of current file pointer.
      void setFileLength(long newLength)
      Sets new file length, truncated or extended.
      default void sync()
      Force all system buffers to synchronize with the underlying device, equivalent to FileDescriptor.sync().

    • Method Detail

      • from

        static FsFile from(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Creates a FsFile from given path.

        This method uses RandomAccessFile to implement FsFile interface, and will use FileChannel.tryLock(long, long, boolean) to lock written part when writing file.

        Parameters:
        path - given path
        Returns:
        a FsFile from given path

      • getPath

        java.nio.file.Path getPath()
        Returns path of file.
        Returns:
        path of file

      • getFile

        default java.io.File getFile()
        Returns file object.
        Returns:
        file object

      • isOpened

        boolean isOpened()
        Returns whether current file is opened.
        Returns:
        whether current file is opened

      • open

        void open(java.lang.String mode)
        Opens current file with given mode, the mode including "r", "rw", "rws", or "rwd", is same with RandomAccessFile.

        This method will restart the stream from bindInputStream() and bindOutputStream().

        Parameters:
        mode - given mode

      • close

        void close()
        Closes current file.

        This method will close the stream from bindInputStream() and bindOutputStream().

      • position

        long position()
        Returns position of current file pointer.
        Returns:
        position of current file pointer

      • position

        void position(long pos)
        Sets position of current file pointer. If the new position over the length of file, the file will be extended.

        This method will reset position for the stream from bindInputStream() and bindOutputStream().

        Parameters:
        pos - position of file pointer

      • length

        long length()
        Returns file length.
        Returns:
        file length

      • setFileLength

        void setFileLength(long newLength)
        Sets new file length, truncated or extended.
        Parameters:
        newLength - new length

      • getChannel

        java.nio.channels.FileChannel getChannel()
        Returns channel of file.
        Returns:
        channel of file

      • getDescriptor

        java.io.FileDescriptor getDescriptor()
        Returns descriptor of file.
        Returns:
        descriptor of file

      • sync

        default void sync()
        Force all system buffers to synchronize with the underlying device, equivalent to FileDescriptor.sync().

      • bindInputStream

        java.io.InputStream bindInputStream()
        Returns an input stream for current file, the read position is position(). Read operations of stream will move the position of file, and if the position is reset by position(long), the stream's read position will also be reset.

        Returned stream doesn't support InputStream.mark(int) and InputStream.reset(), and InputStream.close() is also invalid. Using FsFile.close to close both binding input/output stream.

        Returns:
        an input stream for current file

      • bindOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream bindOutputStream()
        Returns an output stream for current file, the written position is position(). Write operations of stream will move the position of file, and if the position is reset by position(long), the stream's written position will also be reset. If the written data over the length of file, the file will be auto extended.

        InputStream.close() is invalid, using FsFile.close to close both binding input/output stream.

        Returns:
        an output stream for current file
